channel.title: Critical Error
channel.description:
I haz critical error..
I code a paldino76 based source called Milkscape 508 v3.. its palidino76.rs2. based and i just noticed this.. it resets ur acc everytime u log out... but it keeps the coords and everything else..
Is it possible to fix this error? a way to make it save the stats and stuff correctly?? :/ this makes me angry that I was working hard on this for a day and then noticed that it'd be worthless if playersaving didnt work..
can someone help me by telling me what file i should look in? or at least tell me something that'll help?
repcookiez for whoever helps me the bestest?

item.title: Critical Error
item.dc:creator: @excel4 excel4
item.description:
@excel4 wrote:

You need to make a code that saves the acc. I think its in Server tutorials.

Read full topic
